title: [45w#66] [osu!lazer] 2020.4.29 更新日志
author: 45gfg9
txt_content:
本帖最后由 45gfg9 于 2020-5-1 01:03 编辑 
osu!lazer 2020.429.0 [ruby=更新日志]Changelog[/ruby]
osu!lazer at GitHub
Release page

为了这玩意写了个Python解析轮子，累死了
ppy的更新日志写的smjb
直接导致很多看不懂 那我就乱翻一通
看起来非常像机翻但其实不是 那咋办嘛
问题是机翻都比我翻得好 这问题就很大
真的有人会一条一条看过去么
别看了 我自己都觉得丢人
让我看看你坛有多少粉饼人

Chat 聊天
[√] Reduce initial channel load overhead by only loading history on active channel (osu#8893) author: peppy
[√] 通过仅加载当前活跃频道历史记录来减少加载频道时的负载开销 (osu#8893)

Code Quality 代码质量
[+] Add static internal catcher calculation methods for CatchDifficultyCalculator (osu#8830) author: iiSaLMaN
[+] 为CatchDifficultyCalculator添加static内部计算方法 (osu#8830)
[√] Remove obsolete nested hitobject methods (osu#8833) author: smoogipoo
[√] 移除废弃的嵌套hitobject方法 (osu#8833)
[√] Remove obsolete comparison comparer (osu-framework#3478) author: smoogipoo
[√] 移除废弃的比较方法 (osu-framework#3478)
[√] Rename editor tests namespace from "Editor" to "Editing" (osu#8849) author: iiSaLMaN
[√] 重命名编辑器测试命名空间，从"Editor"重命名为"Editing" (osu#8849)
[√] Avoid using internal EF methods in tests (osu#8883) author: peppy
[√] 在测试中避免使用内部EF方法 (osu#8883)

Editor 编辑器
[√] Fix beatmap encoder by enabling untested test cases (osu#8818) author: smoogipoo
[√] 启用未测试的检测情况以修复谱面编码器 (osu#8818)
[√] Use platform bindings for editor actions (osu#8832) author: smoogipoo
[√] 为编辑器行为使用平台绑定 (osu#8832)
[√] Fix editor crashing when entering with no beatmap selected (osu#8856) author: peppy
[√] 修复当无谱面被选中时进入编辑器崩溃 (osu#8856)
[√] Make osu! ruleset placements happen on mouse down (osu#8842) author: smoogipoo
[√] 使osu! ruleset在鼠标点击时放置 (osu#8842)
[√] Fix mania editor placement not working correctly (osu#8843) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复mania编辑器放置未正确工作 (osu#8843)
[√] Implement legacy beatmap encoding for all rulesets (osu#8823) author: smoogipoo
[√] 为所有ruleset实现旧的谱面编码 (osu#8823)
[√] Adjust editor timeline current marker to promote tick visibility (osu#8873) author: peppy
[√] 调整编辑器时间线前的标记以提升tick可见性 (osu#8873)
[√] Fix mania selection blueprints not moving/moving incorrectly (osu#8886) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复mania选择蓝图不移动/错误移动 (osu#8886)

Framework 框架
[√] Disable blending in front-to-back pass (osu-framework#3480) author: smoogipoo
[√] 禁用融入一贯化 (osu-framework#3480)
[√] Fix animation not ignoring time during pause (osu-framework#3485) author: peppy
[√] 修复暂停时动画不忽略时间 (osu-framework#3485)
[√] Expose displays as bindables through IWindow (osu-framework#3427) author: swoolcock
[√] 通过IWindow接口使显示成为bindables (osu-framework#3427)

Gameplay (osu!mania) 游戏体验 (osu!mania)
[√] Fix speed adjustment mods affecting mania scroll speed (osu#8887) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复速度调整mod影响mania滚动速度 (osu#8887)

Gameplay (osu!taiko) 游戏体验 (osu!taiko)
[√] Show visual feedback for taiko drumrolls (osu#8675) author: TimOliver
[√] 为taiko鼓点显示视觉反馈 (osu#8675)

Performance 性能
[√] Reduce database includes where possible (osu#8889) author: peppy
[√] 尽可能减少数据库使用 (osu#8889)
[√] Further improve beatmap carousel load performance by avoiding incorrect query construction (osu#8895) author: peppy
[√] 通过避免不正确的查询以进一步改善谱面选择性能 (osu#8895)

Reliability 可靠性
[√] Fix crash on switching comments page at an inopportune time (osu#8858) author: peppy
[√] 修复当在错误时候切换评论页面时的崩溃 (osu#8858)
[√] Fix null reference while hiding toolbar on tests (osu#8862) author: iiSaLMaN
[√] 修复测试中隐藏工具栏导致的空引用 (osu#8862)
[√] Avoid calls on MusicController executing before it may have finished loading (osu#8881) author: peppy
[√] 避免在MusicController加载完毕前调用 (osu#8881)

Settings 设置
[√] Fix custom rulesets not showing correct icons in key binding settings (osu#8864) author: Game4all
[√] 修复在按键绑定设置中自定义ruleset图标不对 (osu#8864)

Skinning (osu!taiko) 皮肤 (osu!taiko)
[√] Refactor osu!taiko playfield and add background skinning support (osu#8846) author: peppy
[√] 重构osu!taiko游戏界面并增加背景皮肤支持 (osu#8846)
[+] Add osu!taiko bar line skinning support (osu#8848) author: peppy
[+] 添加osu!taiko小节线皮肤支持 (osu#8848)
[√] Fix taiko hit target alpha on legacy skins (osu#8876) author: peppy
[√] 修复taiko在使用旧皮肤时提前击打目标 (osu#8876)
[+] Add taiko hit explosion skinning support (osu#8877) author: peppy
[+] 添加taiko击打爆破皮肤支持 (osu#8877)
[√] Change taiko hit explosion animation to match stable for skins (osu#8896) author: peppy
[√] 更改taiko击打爆破动画以匹配皮肤 (osu#8896)

Song Select 歌曲选择
[√] Fix score multiplier being cut off in mod select at higher ui scales (osu#8860) author: Joehuu
[√] 修复当UI比例设置高的时候分数倍数显示不全 (osu#8860)

Testing 测试
[√] Fix TestBeatmap not setting appropriate ruleset ID (osu#8834) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复TestBeatmap设置的ruleset ID不对 (osu#8834)
[√] Fix dynamic compilation potentially including files from wrong namespace (osu-framework#3481) author: peppy
[√] 修复动态编译可能会包含错误命名空间文件的问题 (osu-framework#3481)

Tooling 工具
[+] Add tree connection lines to make draw visualiser easier to visually parse (osu-framework#3486) author: peppy
[+] 添加树状连接线以使绘制可视化更容易分辨 (osu-framework#3486)

Tournament 锦标赛
[+] Add background video for the Showcase Scene to the tournament client (osu#8859) author: MiraiSubject
[+] 为Showcase Scene锦标赛的客户端添加背景视频 (osu#8859)

UX 用户体验
[√] Fix beatmap string output having empty brackets when pieces are missing (osu#8828) author: peppy
[√] 修复谱面字符串当部分缺失时输出有空括号 (osu#8828)
[√] Load user rulesets from the game data directory (osu#8607) author: Game4all
[√] 从游戏数据文件夹加载用户ruleset (osu#8607)
[√] Fix ruleset selector not receiving key input on toolbar absence (osu#8863) author: iiSaLMaN
[√] 修复ruleset选择器在工具栏不见的时候不接收按键 (osu#8863)
